description: Left hand hedge line consisting primarily of Pyracantha (applicants ref. G1) - Approximately 5.00m: Reduce back to previous height up to 1.00m reduction of fine extension growth. Reduce lateral and sub lateral over extended growth overhanging the planting area, hard back into main hedge line approximately 1.00m. General maintenance.1 x Cherry (applicants ref. T1) -  Approximately 5.00m: Thin crown density by 20%. Tip prune to reduce by 30cm. Remove dead wood. Trim taller shrubs within the left hand boundary bed to tidy approximately 50cm. Control encroachment/General maintenance.1 x Amelanchier (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 5.00m: Thin crown density by 20%. Tip prune to reduce by approximately 30cm all round. General maintenance.1 x Mature Robinia (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 7.00m: (Adjacent Paddock): Reduce crown by up to 1.20m all round. Thin crown density by 15%. Remove dead wood. General maintenance. Mature Bay & Damson (applicants ref. G2) - Approximately 5.00m-6.00m: Reduce regrowth back into previous hedge line by up to 1.00m. Reduce lateral and sub lateral growth overhanging lawn by 50cm. Control encroachment/ General maintenance.1 x Damson (applicants ref. T4) - Approximately 6.00m-7.00m: Reduce crown by approximately 1.20m. Thin crown density by 20% to tidy and control height. General maintenance.1 x Small Acer (applicants ref. T5) - Approximately 3.00m: Trim to tidy approximately 0.50m-0.75m. General maintenance.1 x Large Acer (applicants ref. T6) - Approximately 7.00m: Reduce crown by 0.75cm. Thin crown density by 20%.1 x Mature Prunus (applicants ref. T7) - Approximately 5.00m: Tip prune by up to 0.50m. Trim larger shrubs within bed by 0.5m-0.75m. General maintenance.Pyracantha (applicants ref. G3) - Approximately 5.00m: Reduce hard back to shape and balance. 0.5m. General maintenance.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
